data.question: What is the empirical formula of MIL-88B?
What method was used for the synthesis of MIL-88B solids?
What is the swelling amplitude of MIL-88B(4CH3) in percentage?
Does the introduction of four methyl groups per spacer in MIL-88B result in a large permanent porosity?
Is the thermal stability of MIL-88B(2OH) lower than that of nonmodified MIL-88?
What effect does the introduction of functional groups have on the swelling properties of MIL-88 solids?
data.answer: It affects the swelling behavior drastically, leading to a decrease in breathing amplitude and facilitating swelling in liquid phase.

data.question: What is the role of NaOH in the synthesis of MIL-88B?
data.answer: It is used in the reaction mixture for the synthesis process.

data.question: Can MIL-88B(2OH) exhibit significant porosity after complete activation?
What computational method was used to determine the structures of modified MIL-88 forms?
data.answer: Energy minimization procedures using the universal force field (UFF) and charges calculated from the Electronegativity Equalization method.

data.question: Does the presence of residual molecules in the pores of MIL-88B(CH3) lead to a permanent porosity?
What is the effect of functionalization on the thermal stability of MIL-88 solids?
data.answer: The introduction of functional groups does not generally lead to a drastic change in the thermal stability.

data.question: What is the BET surface area of the fully activated MIL-88B(4CH3) sample?
Is the swelling behavior of MIL-88D affected by the length of the organic spacer?
What is the role of DMF in the synthesis of MIL-88B solids?
data.answer: DMF is used as a solvent in the synthesis process.

data.question: Does the modification of MIL-88 solids with functional groups lead to changes in selective adsorption of guests?
Can MIL-88D(4CH3) reopen its pores in nonpolar solvents?
What is the swelling amplitude of MIL-88D(4CH3) in percentage?
Does the presence of methyl groups in MIL-88D reduce the π–π interactions within the dried form?
What is the effect of functionalization on the energetics of the breathing phenomenon in MIL-88 solids?
data.answer: Functionalization can significantly change the energetics, affecting the ability of the structure to swell in the presence of liquids.

data.question: Is the swelling behavior of MIL-88 solids in liquid phase driven by the minimal accessible pore size and host–guest interactions?
